channel.title: [PI]Vote Ticket shop[PI]
channel.description: Ok I added a shop that you can buy items with Shantay passes. but when i wanna buysomething I need to have coins in my inventory. It doesn't use coins but It gotta have coins in inventory , how i fix this?

item.title: [PI]Vote Ticket shop[PI]
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

[quote=“crazyfazespy, post:4, topic:397785”]do like i did to my donator portal
actionhandler class

case 4151: if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.sendMessage("You need to be Donator to use this portal!"); return; } c.getPA().movePlayer(2929, 9692, 4); c.sendMessage("Welcome to donator area!"); break;
ofcorse edit this simple command to urs[/quote]

Yea I managed to fix it , thanks tho.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Vote Ticket shop[PI]
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

do like i did to my donator portal
actionhandler class

case 4151: if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.sendMessage("You need to be Donator to use this portal!"); return; } c.getPA().movePlayer(2929, 9692, 4); c.sendMessage("Welcome to donator area!"); break;
ofcorse edit this simple command to urs

item.title: [PI]Vote Ticket shop[PI]
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:2, topic:397785”]Go into PlayerAssisstant.java and search:

and below you’ll see a code like this:

if ((wearID == 773 || wearID == 9906 || wearID == 15041 || wearID == 10760) && (c.playerRights < 1 )) { c.sendMessage("This is an Staff only item."); return false; }

If you don’t see this, you can add it. Also change the rights to whatever you want.[/quote]
Isn’t that items?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Vote Ticket shop[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Go into PlayerAssisstant.java and search:

and below you’ll see a code like this:

if ((wearID == 773 || wearID == 9906 || wearID == 15041 || wearID == 10760) && (c.playerRights < 1 )) { c.sendMessage("This is an Staff only item."); return false; }

If you don’t see this, you can add it. Also change the rights to whatever you want.

Read full topic
